entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:45 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 2:27 PM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.8°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: NNW 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Clearing early this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
